name: King of Britain
description:
After giving power to his daughters Regan and Cordelia, King Lear has been thrown into prison. They’ve taken everything, from the Kingdom to the clothes of his back. Get out of prison through booby traps and haunted enemies to regain his status as King. The battle for the King’s freedom is a 3D dungeon crawler with quirks along the way.

AUT Digital Design Year 1 group

Vaughn Low

Carlos Rankin

Becca Chen

Jessica Sun

Royalty Free music Used:

Legend of the King – Whitesand
